overview: In the wake of a global viral outbreak, Breck Anderson and his wife Annie flee Southern California. Using the vastness of the desert to avoid populated areas, they travel northeast for the isolation of the Rockies. Car trouble forces them to stop at what appears to be an abandoned convenience station. They soon find themselves in a situation where there is no turning back. With their relationship and lives in the balance, when the day ends nothing will be the same.
title: Pandemic
